{"step_by_step_thinking": "The staging of GTN (Gestational Trophoblastic Neoplasia) is determined by the FIGO (International Federation of Gynecology and Obstetrics) system. According to Document [10], Stage III of GTN is characterized by the disease extending to the lungs, with or without known genital tract involvement. Therefore, GTN with lung metastasis would be classified as Stage III.", "answer_choice": "C"}
